prompts.title: Unicorn Treasure Hunt
prompts.description: A unicorn discovers a treasure chest in a cave filled with jewels and glowing runes.

prompts.title: Gothic Unicorn Night
prompts.description: A dark unicorn with bat wings stands beneath a full moon and twisted trees.

prompts.title: Unicorn Music Band
prompts.description: Unicorns play instruments like harps and flutes in a magical band.

prompts.title: Unicorn and the Mermaid Lagoon
prompts.description: A unicorn greets mermaids lounging on rocks by a glowing lagoon.

prompts.title: Magical Unicorn School
prompts.description: Unicorns attend a floating school with books, scrolls, and magical chalkboards.

prompts.title: Safari Unicorn Adventure
prompts.description: A unicorn explores a safari landscape with giraffes and elephants wearing wizard hats.

prompts.title: Unicorn and the Crystal Cavern
prompts.description: A unicorn discovers a cave filled with sparkling crystals and magical artifacts.

prompts.title: Time Traveler Unicorn
prompts.description: A unicorn leaps through swirling portals showing past and future worlds.

prompts.title: Unicorn Jungle Trek
prompts.description: A unicorn journeys through a jungle with colorful parrots and waterfalls.

prompts.title: Unicorn Masquerade Ball
prompts.description: Unicorns dance in masks and gowns in a grand enchanted ballroom.

prompts.title: Unicorn Castle Tower
prompts.description: A unicorn stands on the tower balcony of a sparkling crystal castle.

prompts.title: Unicorn Zen Garden
prompts.description: A peaceful unicorn meditates in a garden with raked sand and koi fish.

prompts.title: Unicorn and Magic Mirror
prompts.description: A unicorn looks into a mirror that shows a parallel mystical universe.

prompts.title: Skydiving Unicorns
prompts.description: Unicorns in parachutes float down from the sky surrounded by rainbows.

prompts.title: Unicorn and Fireflies
prompts.description: A unicorn gallops through a night meadow lit up by swarming fireflies.

prompts.title: Unicorn Safari Balloons
prompts.description: Unicorns ride animal-shaped balloons over a rainbow-striped savanna.

prompts.title: Unicorn Art Studio
prompts.description: A unicorn paints a canvas with sparkly splashes of color and floating brushes.

prompts.title: Pirate Unicorn Ship
prompts.description: A unicorn dressed as a pirate sails on a ship with a rainbow flag and treasure map.

prompts.title: Unicorn Sleepover
prompts.description: Unicorns in pajamas tell stories, eat snacks, and gaze at glow-in-the-dark stars.

prompts.title: Unicorns in Love
prompts.description: Two unicorns touch horns beneath a heart-shaped constellation.

prompts.title: Unicorn Puzzle World
prompts.description: A unicorn wanders through a surreal landscape made of floating puzzle pieces and chessboards.
